text: Cloo was an American pay television channel. It was owned and operated by NBCUniversal. It aired programming originally dedicated to the crime and mystery genres. The channel launched on January 1, 2006, replacing Trio. It ceased broadcasting on February 1, 2017. Category:American television channels Category:NBCUniversal Category:2006 establishments in the United States Category:2017 disestablishments in the United States
title: Cloo
